newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINLAND WANTS BOND RETURN LINKS TO ANY STOCK INDEX.
newsitem.headline: FINLAND WANTS BOND RETURN LINKS TO ANY STOCK INDEX.

text.p: Supervision (Rata) said on Wednesday it will propose to the
finance ministry to allow linking bond returns to any stock
"The financial supervision is proposing to the finance
ministry to ease as soon as possible the law on allowing the
link between bond returns and stock market indices," Rata said
"Rata proposes that besides Finnish and European economic area (EEA) stock market indices, bond returns could be linked to any stock market index around the world," it said.
Current legislation allows pegging returns on index-linked bonds issued by a Finnish company or another party only to Finnish and European economic area (EEA) stock market indices.
Rata said that by this proposal it wants to ensure that issuers of Finnish bonds are in the same position as overseas issuers. -- Helsinki newsroom +358-9-680 50 240, news@Reuters.fi
